remaining stitches at the nose and sew along the bottom seam leaving a gap for stuffing turn to the right side and stuff firmly mark the position for the eyes with glass headed needles take your time as the eyes and ears determines the character of your finished bunny thread a long needle with yarn or embroidery thread and tie a knot in it take your needle through the stuffing gap and out to the point of the glass pin remove pin stitch across one stitch bring the thread out through the stuffing gap and pull gently until the eye socket is formed tie the yarn to the tail do not cut the thread
